attributes.action: college students should recieve more financial help
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current weekly payment from the EMA(Educational Maintenance allowance)is currently £30 pound a week for a family income under £25,000, i would like to see this raised to £50 a week, this is for the student supplies needed such as; books(which are not cheap for A-level students)

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/studentfunds/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
